translation: I am easily attainable by that ever-steadfast yogi who constantly and daily remembers me for a long time, not thinking of anything else with a single-minded or one-pointed focus, O Partha.
commentary: 8.14 Exclusive mind with the mind not thinking of any other object? constantly constantly? who who? Maam Me? remembers remembers? Everyday daily? of him of him? I'm I? Easily attainable? Partha O Partha? of the eversteadfast?
